ChunkText: graduate assistantships ta, ra assistantships are a great way for graduate students to help fund their studies, however, positions are competitive and funded by individual departments. if you are interested in an assistantship, please contact your department to find out what opportunities may be available.
ContextAfter: if you have been offered a graduate assistantship by your department, please carefully review the information below to learn more about what to expect upon your arrival to umbc.
